lines.text:
[Referring to Stevens]
How's the tough guy? Is he behaving?
He's talking business. He wants to make a deal. He thinks his life is worth money.

[Contemptuously]
How much did he offer... two bucks?
Perhaps the memory that causes your dream has something to do with your family, your mother maybe.
We've been all through that, haven't we? We finished with her!
No, you're not! You'll never be!
But she's dead. She meant nothing to me when she was alive!
She's the only woman you ever really loved. Allthe other women in your life are substitutes for her!
